general_info.summary: This text appears to be a navigation or sitemap from the NIU (Noida International University) website. It lists various sections such as Careers, Feedback, About NIU (including leadership, recognitions, awards, and collaborations), University Authorities (like the Board of Governors), and various policies and ordinances related to CRS, scholarships, fees, hostels, and university statutes. It also mentions COVID-19 and a specific report, NISP 2019, with a link to the collaborations page.

admission_requirements.summary: The provided text outlines various aspects of the admission and counselling process for CUET, including applying for counselling, admission alerts, details about the admission and outreach team, Ph.D. admissions, domestic brochures for Indian students, and the prospectus. It also mentions information regarding courses and fee structure for 2025-26, scholarships, bank loans, transport, and hostels, encouraging applications for 2025.

It also includes some healthcare facilities and a cultural heritage bureau.
